channel.title: Fixed on asyncial
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on asyncial

item.title: Plan 9 -> Linux
item.description: Plan 9 from Bell Labs is one of the more interesting operating systems out there. I’ve always found it interesting to find software, that is in some way inspired by Plan 9 on other operating systems. So, to document what I find on this, I decided to make a list of Plan 9 inspired Linux programs. Ports This category gets the straight-up ports of Plan9 programs to Linux/Unix out of the way, before going further.

item.title: Kritische Informatik | Critical Computer Science
item.description: Einführung | Introduction Wissenschaftliche Methode in der Softwareentwicklung | Scientific Method in Software Engineering What we actually know about Software Development, and why we believe it’s true by Greg Wilson [EN][VID] Design Principles behind Smalltalk by Daniel H. H. Ingalls [EN][PDF] NEW The Programming Language Wars by Andreas Stefik [EN][VID] Sicherheit | Security Click here to kill everybody by Bruce Schneier [EN][VID] Why do Keynote Speakers keep suggesting that Improving Security is possible by James Mickens [EN][VID] Geschlechtergerechtigkeit | Gender Equality Sofia - Das Silicon Valley für Frauen von Rayna Breuer [DE][VID] When Women stopped Coding by Planet Money [EN][AUD] Freie Software und Arbeit | Free Software and Labor Free Software and the Revolt against Transactionality by John Ohno [EN] Die Gewerkschaften müssen kooperieren Interview mit Ayad Al-Ani [DE] We are complicit in our employer’s deeds by Drew DeVault [EN] NEW The unrealized potential of federation by Drew DeVault [EN] NEW Thesen zu “Industrie 4.
